readingMnemonic:
Depending on the context, the reading for this word could be からい or つらい. 

The からい reading is the <vocabulary>spicy</vocabulary> one that you learned with the kanji, which you can remember because spicy foods give a <reading>から</reading>て chop to your mouth. 

The つらい reading is the <vocabulary>difficult</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>painful</vocabulary> one. You can remember this because <reading>two Ra</reading>s (つら) are way more difficult to deal with than one Ra.
